message: This product is a great deal! It's only $100, a steal! I'm willing to sell it to you at a huge discount from its true value. Don't miss out on this opportunity!
I'm not buying anything without knowing the quality of the product first.

I've got a top-of-the-line product for you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $100, which is 66.67% off the market value. This is a one-time offer, and I'm only selling it to you because I value our relationship. Trust me, you won't find a deal like this anywhere else!
I'm not falling for the sales pitch. I need to know the quality before I make a decision.

I'm being completely transparent with you. This product has a 50% chance of being high-quality, and a 50% chance of being low-quality. But think about it, if you don't buy it, you'll never know if it's the high-quality one that's worth $300. And even if it is low-quality, it's only $100, which is a small risk. What do you have to lose?
I'll take the risk and buy the product. I'll just have to hope it's the high-quality one.
